ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 58
ygData.msgSnippet: We got the dual wield skill, as well as rogues, bards, um, who am I missing? Rogues have backstab  - no one else.  Bards have their songs, no one -else.
ygData.messageBody:
We got the dual wield skill, as well as rogues, bards, um, who am I missing?
Rogues have backstab - no one else. Bards have their songs, no one -else.
Warriors are basically damage takers, thats it. Why even give them dual
wield if it doesn't help that much?

Angarth, Sponge of the 15th Tier


> ----------
> From: Wayne Sheppard[SMTP:mrwayne@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 10:05 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Digest Number 58
>
> From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>
>
> These are your problems:
> - Don't solo as a warrior, the downtime is too long
> - Stay with 1hd weapons, you got the dual wield skill for a reason
>
>
> > Date: Thu, 10 Jun 1999 14:39:28 -0400
> > From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
> > Subject: Re: Cut and Paste form EQ'Lizer
> >
> >
> > For reference. You may recall that I had started a ranger about 3 weeks
> ago. I have been playing with that character more than my warrior because
> I
> wanted to compare capabilities at the same level. My ranger uses a 2
> handed
> dwarven axe (great weapon by the way, 14 damage 43 delay), and sometimes a
> 1
> handed dwarven axe. He is at level 15. I can solo any blue, many yellows
> and i have even soloed a few red orc slavers. In comparison my warrior,
> level 16 is beaten to the point of 10 minute resting after a fight by most
> blues. He runs from anything that is yellow or red.
> >
> > In a group the ranger meets all the same party needs as a warrior plus
> he
> provides his own healing and buffing. My 16th level warrior is about to
> get
> a fine steel 2 handed sword and work up his 2hs skill to a comparable
> level
> as the ranger. We will see how that goes.
> >
> > The warrior formerly known as Bael
> >
> > Now one of those weenie wood elf rangers, Aelyn.
>
>
>
